answers.answer: Hi, welcome to the forum, there are many causes of dry throat. Some causes of dry mouth/throat are Anxiety, Systemic diseases like Sjögren's syndrome, Amyloidosis, Sarcoidosis, uncontrolled diabetes mellitus and Dehydration. Even existing sinusitis or acid reflux can cause trickling in the throat.Even certain medications are known to cause dehydration like Antidepressants, Antihistamines, Anticholinergics, and Diuretics etc.Drugs like Pilocarpine or Cevimeline, which prevents dry mouth, should only be taken after consultation from physician. You need to drink lot of water to maintain water level in the body. Sinusitis should be managed by appropriate antibiotics.You need to under investigations like blood sugar; chest and sinuses radiograph to rule out the causes. Allergy is unlikely in your case to cause dry throat. I hope this helped you. Take care and regards.

title: Irritating throat.
